properties.Site_name: Telephone Exchange, Bramhall Lane South, Bramhall

properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.

There is no indication that this use will relocate in the future, so the current use prevents any reasonable prospect of the site being redeveloped for residential use.

properties.Site_name: Area Bounded by Wharf Street, Lancashire Hill, Gordon Street, Sheffield Street, Heaton Norris.

properties.Site_name: Cheadle Golf Club

properties.Site_name: Philips sport and social club, Pepper Road, Hazel Grove

properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is sandwiched between residential and allocated employment land, there is potential to redevelop the brick building and car park into a higher density with a mix of leisure and residential uses, however there is a recent application for the extension of the gym use. Given the constraints and active use, the likelihood of it being redeveloped for residential is low, so the site has been assessed as not developable.

properties.Assessment_text: This is an industrial unit, in the middle of an industrial estate that is a designated employment allocation. Due to its designation and location, it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Bredbury Park Industrial Estate Plot 8, Horsfield Way
properties.Site_description: Industrial unit on large industrial estate
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is an industrial unit, in the middle of an industrial estate that is a designated employment allocation. Due to its designation and location, it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Bredbury Park Industrial Estate Plot 11, Bredbury Park Way
properties.Site_description: Industrial unit on large industrial estate
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is an industrial unit, in the middle of an industrial estate that is a designated employment allocation. Due to its designation and location, it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Bredbury Park Industrial Estate Plot 5/6, Bredbury Park Way
properties.Site_description: Industrial unit on large industrial estate
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is an industrial unit, in the middle of an industrial estate that is a designated employment allocation. Due to its designation and location, it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land at Leicester Street and Gorton Road, Reddish
properties.Site_description: Open land surrounded by dwellings and local shops
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This area of open space provides amenity space and there are substantial trees on this site which limits the potential capacity for development of residential units, although this does not completely prohibit development, it does present constraints which on such a modest sized site may be difficult to viably overcome.

properties.Site_name: St Catherine's Preparatory School, Hollins Lane SK6 5BB
properties.Site_description: Childcare centre
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site has the potential to offer residential accommodation as part of a comprehensive mixed use development, however given the active use for childcare facilities with no indication of this use ceasing, any redevelopment is unlikely to happen for the forseeable future.

properties.Site_name: 105 Brinksway, Edgeley, Stockport, SK3 0BY
properties.Site_description: A mix of commercial land, hardstanding and protected local open space, wrapped around an electric sub station.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: Steep topography is likely to be a significant constraint to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Cuddington Crescent Open Space, Bridgehall, Stockport, SK3 8US
properties.Site_description: Area of open space surroudned by a railway line, residential development, and a primary school.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is designated as Green Chain and Local Open Space, and has been assessed as an area of amenity green space having higher value in the Open Space Assessment; the combination of its designation and scoring presents a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Land to west of Yew Tree Road, Davenport, Stockport, SK3 8TR
properties.Site_description: Area of open space set within allotments.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is designated as Green Chain and is in use as allotments; these present a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Site off Chester Road, Woodford
properties.Site_description: Fuel refinery on edge of urban area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This fuel refinery is in active use, until this use ceases, there is no realistic potential for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Site off Buxton Road, to north of Ashton Place and Carlton Place
properties.Site_description: Site between railway line and Poise Brook, covered in mature trees
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is designated as green chain, is almost entirely covered in trees and has Poise Brook running through it. It is next to the railway line and there may be some ground contamination that would need to be remediated. This site is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Vernon Mill, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Mill in a range of active employment uses, close to Stockport town centre.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is constrained by current policy restrictions relating to loss of employment land. It is should not be included in land supply at present, but this will be reviewed at the next update of the land availability assessment.

properties.Site_name: Land to south of Priory Hospital, Cheadle Royal SK8 3DG
properties.Site_description: Area of open space next to hospital
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is designated as green chain, local open space, a conservation area, and is also a historic park and garden. These sensitivity of this site presents a constraint to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Site to east of St. Anns Road North, Cheadle
properties.Site_description: Area of undeveloped land set between residential and employment uses.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is in a proposed employment allocation which is adjacent to an existing employment allocation that has modern units. The site is also in the airport safety zone, which restricts the potential height of development. These present constraints to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Cheadle Royal Business Park
properties.Site_description: Larger business park
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This business park is located within an employment allocation and is well used; this presents a constraint to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Frog and Railway Public House and Car Park, Didsbury Road
properties.Site_description: Pub and associated car park
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The existing building is a pub, and this use would need to cease prior to conversion to residential use. After a period of being vacant, the building has gone back into active use as a pub.

properties.Site_name: Brighton Road Industrial Estate
properties.Site_description: Cleared industrial land next to the M60
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is currently being developed for B1 and sui generis uses (new Mercedes-Benz showroom).

properties.Site_name: Buildings and land between Wood Street and Bann Street
properties.Site_description: Fire station, pub, and snooker hall and club, close to Stockport town centre.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The buildings are in active use; given the location and nature of the fire station, until this use ceases there is no realistic potential for residential development across this site.

properties.Site_name: Land off Cymbal Court, Lancashire Hill, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Road embankment next to Tiviot Way
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: Steep topography and unneighbourly use of Tiviot Way means that it is very unlikely that a residential scheme could provide a suitable buffer to provide sufficient amenity for future occupiers.

properties.Site_name: Sorting Office, George Lane, Bredbury
properties.Site_description: Royal Mail sorting office in residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is in use as a Royal Mail sorting office, which would have to cease before the site can be developed for residential. Some of this site is on top of a railway tunnel, so redevelopment may be constrained by the ground conditions.

properties.Site_name: Land at Life Leisure, Hazel Grove
properties.Site_description: Open space next to leisure centre, in residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This local open space site is a designated area of amenity green space that is one of the highest scoring in the borough for quality, as recorded in the Open Space Assessment; it is therefore not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Site on Hempshaw Lane and Christie Street, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Former works
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site has recently been redeveloped as a supermarket.

properties.Site_name: Land opposite Moorfield School, Lyndhurst Avenue, Hazel Grove
properties.Site_description: Area of open space in residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated area of local open space has been assessed as an area of amenity green space having higher value in the Open Space Assessment; this presents a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Land at end of Kinross Avenue, Hazel Grove, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Small pocket of open space set within wider network, and within residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site has been assessed within the Open Space Assessment as part of the chain of open space along Kinross Avenue, as having low quality, but higher value. Due to this constraint, it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land off Ringmore Road, opposite Redford Drive, Bramhall
properties.Site_description: Area of open space in residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated area of local open space has been assessed as an area of amenity green space having higher quality and higher value in the Open Space Assessment; this presents a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Playing Fields adjoining 188 Dialstone Lane, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Playing fields in residential area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated area of local open space are playing fields and may have potential contamination issues, which present a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Land at Houldsworth Golf Club, Houldsworth Street SK5 6BN
properties.Site_description: Golf course practice area and car parking
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a wedge of Strategic Open Space that forms part of the land associated with the active Golf Club, thie presence of this designation provides a constraint to development.

properties.Site_name: Land at Midland Road, Bramhall, Stockport,
properties.Site_description: Former landfill site.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: There are significant contamination issues on this site due to the presence of historic landfill, until this can be proven to be safely remediated, it is considered to be a constraint to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Mirlees Fields, Mirlees Drive, Hazel Grove, SK7 5BP
properties.Site_description: Very large area of open space
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a designated area of strategic open space, which has been assessed as being an area of natural and semi-natural greenspace in the Open Space Assessment; the strategic value of this site means that it is not suitable for housing.

properties.Site_name: Powerleague Stockport, Craig Road, Heaton Mersey, SK4 2AP
properties.Site_description: Multi-use games area used as playing pitches, set between a nature reserve, residential and commercial development.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: There is a shortage playing pitches in the Heatons and Reddish, so the loss of these pitches would not be acceptable.

properties.Site_name: Land at Stanley Green Retail Park, Earl Road, Stockport, SK8 6PT
properties.Site_description: Vacant site next to a prominent roundabout and industrial estate.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is part of an employment allocation at Stanley Green Retail park, and has planning permission for A3/A5 use; these present a constraint to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Station Road and Nelstrop Road North, Reddish
properties.Site_description: Area of open space and a reservoir.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The site is designated as green chain. Around two thirds of this site is entirely covered by a reservoir, which would have to be drained and the habitat recreated elsewhere to mitigate the loss. There is also no established vehicular access to the site, so one would have to be created.

properties.Site_name: Station Road and Bradfield Close, Reddish
properties.Site_description: Pond
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The site is designated as green chain. This site is entirely covered by a pond which has partially grown over, this would have to be drained and the habitat recreated elsewhere to mitigate the loss. There is also no established vehicular access to the site, so one would have to be created. A path runs along the northern boundary of the site.

properties.Site_name: Bredbury St Marks Cricket Club, Hillside Road, Woodley, SK6 1HS
properties.Site_description: Cricket ground surrounded by dwellings on 3 sides
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This greenfield site is designated as local open space and is used as a cricket ground. The loss of this use would not be acceptable therefore it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Bells Paddock, corner of Bramhall Lane and Cale Green, Cale Green,
properties.Site_description: Area of open space with plentiful tree cover in a developed area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This greenfield site is designated as local open space, is covered in trees and is in a conservation area. The loss of this would not be acceptable therefore it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Hallam Gardens, Bramhall Lane, Cale Green,
properties.Site_description: Open space and play area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated local open space is an area of amenity greenspace that has scored highly for both quality and value in the Open Space Assessment.

properties.Site_name: Cale Green Park, Heath Road, Davenport, SK2 6JN
properties.Site_description: Cale Green Park, set between dwellings and a railway line
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This greenfield site is designated as local open space, green chain and is in a conservation area. The loss of this would not be acceptable therefore it is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land to rear of Bramhall Park Golf Club, 20 Manor Road, Bramhall, SK7 3EY
properties.Site_description: Buildings associated with maintenance of golf club
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site forms part of a wider area of strategic open space; the strategic value of this means that it is not suitable for housing.

properties.Site_name: Land adjacent to Lothlorien House, Carwood Road, Bramhall, SK7 3EY
properties.Site_description: Green field land covered in mature trees
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site forms part of a wider area of strategic open space; the strategic value of this means that it is not suitable for housing.

properties.Site_name: Land off Europa Way, Cheadle Hulme, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Former landfill site.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is designated as local open space and green chain. Part of the site is a former landfill, these present constraints to development.

properties.Site_name: Land at Brinksway and Hollywood Way, Edgeley, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Vacant site on edge of industrial estate
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This sites is vacant land in a designated employment area, and contributes to the employment land supply. It is also located within flood zones 2 and 3. All of these present constraints to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Calderbrook Drive Cheadle Hulme
properties.Site_description: Private open space used for grazing, in residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The site is currently identified as local open space, but it is not publically accessible as it is used for private grazing, and so has not been assessed in the Open Space Assessment. There are a number of environmental constraints that have not been demonstrated to be satisfactorily mitigated, and until this happens it is unlikely that this site can be brought forward for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land Between Hibbert lane and Green Bank Crescent, Marple
properties.Site_description: Area of open space entirely enclosed by residential dwellings.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small pocket of open space is constrained by lack of an access point for construction vehicles to enable development, and is surrounded on all sides by residential dwellings.

properties.Site_name: M60 Junction 1, Roundabout South, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Motorway / highway embankment
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a piece of land in the middle of a motorway roundabout. It is not suitable for residential development due to access and amenity issues.

properties.Site_name: M60 Junction 1, Roundabout North, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Motorway / highway embankment
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a piece of land in the middle of a motorway roundabout. It is not suitable for residential development due to access and amenity issues.

properties.Site_name: Land between Travis Brow and the M60
properties.Site_description: Ambulance station and sewage works next to M60
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This land is currently in use with no indication that these uses will cease. If the site were vacated, there would be amenity issues for residential development, due to its location between the M60 and strategic road network.

properties.Site_name: Wharfdale road, Reddish
properties.Site_description: Area of open space entirely enclosed by residential dwellings.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small pocket of open space is constrained by lack of an access point for construction vehicles to enable development, and is surrounded on all sides by residential dwellings.

properties.Site_name: Wellington Road North, George's Road and Railway Street, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Railway embankment and former railway tunnel
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The topography and location of this site, and the presence of a railway tunnel, makes this site unsuitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Tiviot Dale railway cutting, between Wellington Road and Hatton Street, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Dismantled railway line, next to M60
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The topography and location of this site makes this site unsuitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land west of The Broadway and north of Kingsway, Bredbury
properties.Site_description: Area of open space in established residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated area of local open space is constrained by topography, trees and watercourses, and is not suitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Belmont Way/Baker Street,
properties.Site_description: Care home, in primarily residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: After a period of being vacant, this building is back in in active use, which means the prospect of redevelopment is low over the forseeable future.

properties.Site_name: Land next to Brinnington Hall Care Home, off Brinnington Road
properties.Site_description: Area of open space in established residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is being improved as part of the mitigation for the development of the adjacent Brinnington Hall, therefore it cannot be developed for residential purposes.

properties.Site_name: Tiviot Dale railway cutting, east of Lancashire Hill, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Dismantled railway line, next to M60
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The topography and location of this site makes this site unsuitable for residential development.

properties.Site_name: Finsbury Road, Reddish
properties.Site_description: Area of open space entirely enclosed by residential dwellings.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small pocket of open space is constrained by lack of an access point for construction vehicles to enable development, and is surrounded on all sides by residential dwellings.

properties.Site_name: Portwood Roundabout, Burial Ground
properties.Site_description: Burial ground within roundabout
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This piece of land in the middle of a roundabout is not suitable for residential development due to access and amenity issues.

properties.Site_name: Land between Turncroft Lane and Greystoke Street
properties.Site_description: Area of open space entirely enclosed by residential dwellings.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small pocket of open space is constrained by lack of an access point for construction vehicles to enable development, and is surrounded on all sides by residential dwellings.

properties.Site_name: Silverdale Road / St Ann's Road North, Gatley
properties.Site_description: Large area of open space covered in mature trees and vegetation, set within an established residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This area of designated open space is covered in mature trees, the loss of which is unlikely to be considered acceptable would be very difficult to mitigate, especially as it also forms part of the green chain network across Stockport.

properties.Site_name: Land at Coleridge Road, North Reddish
properties.Site_description: Small area of open space set within an established residential area, bounded by a road on all sides with properties looking onto it.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small area of open space provides visual amenity value for the properties that look onto it. Due to its small size, and setting it is unlikely that it could be developed without harming local amenity value.

properties.Site_name: Wainwright Close Open Space
properties.Site_description: Area of open space adjacent to cemetery and residential area.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This area of open space is a long strip shape that provides a visual buffer between existing residents and the local cemetery. Due to the shape, size and setting, it is unlikely that it could be developed without harming local amenity.

properties.Site_name: Bruntwood Hall, Bruntwood Park, Cheadle
properties.Site_description: 19th Century Mansion
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: A planning permission for use as a hotel has recently been implemented.

properties.Site_name: Land to north of Ringway Road / Thurlestone Drive
properties.Site_description: Small area of open space with a stream and public footpath passing through the middle, and surrounded by residential development.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is heavily constrained by the presence of a stream, public right of way, trees, topography and access. It is unlikely that these constraints can be overcome to enable a residential development that would be acceptable in planning terms.

properties.Site_name: Brooklands Farm, Bean Leach Road, Offerton, Stockport, SK2 5JE
properties.Site_description: Farm buildings and land
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: Much of this site forms part of a wider area of strategic open space; the strategic value of this means that it is not suitable for housing. Furthermore, an outline application for the principle of residential development was refused at appeal.

properties.Site_name: Roundhey Open Space
properties.Site_description: Area of open space surrounded by residential development.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This designated area of open space is constrained by lack of an access point for construction vehicles to enable development, and is surrounded on all sides by residential dwellings.

properties.Site_name: Clovelley Road Open Space
properties.Site_description: Area of open space surrounded by residential development.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This small area of open space is almost entirely surrounded by dwellings. Although safe highways access could potentially be made, it is unlikely that the loss of trees or the impact upon the amenity of the existing dwellings could be successfully mitigated against to make any new development acceptable in planning terms.

properties.Site_name: Blackstone Road Open Space
properties.Site_description: Area of open space surrounded by residential development.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a large area of local open space, and part of the site is now subject planning permission for 27 units, which forms part of the residential land supply.

properties.Site_name: Land At Bramhall Lane South, Bramhall, Stockport, SK7 2DU
properties.Site_description: Green field land, adjacent to residential care home and railway line
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This undeveloped land is designated as green chain and is within a conservation area. The type of land and policy designation present constraints to residential development.

properties.Site_name: Land off Russell Avenue, to south of High Lane Primary School
properties.Site_description: Irregularly shaped area of open space, surrounded by residential development and a primary school.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is not currently developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This area of open space is heavily covered by trees, follows the line of a brook and is identified as Green Chain. It is unlikely that these constraints could be overcome in a satisfactory manner to enable residential development.

properties.Site_name: Town Centre Living Area
properties.Site_description: Town centre living area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is deliverable.
properties.Assessment_text: Town Centre Living Area

properties.Site_name: St George's Vicarage, Buxton Road, Cale Green, Stockport, SK2 6NU
properties.Site_description: Vicarage associated with St George's church.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This substantial period building could potentially be suitable for a sensitive conversion into residential use, together with enabling development.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and is in a sustainable location. This vicarage is listed, located within a conservation area and there are some protected trees on the site.
properties.Availability_assessment: The availability of this site needs to be confirmed, but is likely to be in single ownership. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Land at Lancashire Hill, adjacent to Clarkethorn Terrace
properties.Site_description: Informal open space next to high-rise residential
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site would lend itself to higher rise apartments to be in keeping with the nearby residential development, which could result in a higher density than indicated.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. This is site next to tall residential units, any overshading by existing residential structures would have to be taken into account. There are some trees on the site, any loss of these would need to be mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: The availability of this site needs to be confirmed, but is likely to be in single ownership. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Car park and building on Didsbury Road, opposite Greenbank Avenue
properties.Site_description: Car park and Scout Hut
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: There is potential for the provision of a mix of residential and community uses, if car parking provision and community use of the Scout hut can be addressed and included as part of the redevelopment this site.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. It is in a conservation area.  Facilities for the Scout hut/community use should be provided or mitgation for their loss provided.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be required to created a single development parcel, so the site is not considered to be available yet. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: 305-307 Gorton Road, North Reddish, Stockport, SK5 6LN
properties.Site_description: A number of small structures in commercial use offering car repairs, surrounded by dwellings and recreational open space.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a small site that is in use as vehicle hire and repairs and is very close to existing dwellings. The redevelopment of this site could offer a positive impact upon the amenity of the nearby properties.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is accessible, located close to a train station (within 600m) and is in a sustainable location. Some of the site is identified as local open space, any loss of this should be appropriately mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be required to created a single development parcel, so the site is not likely to be available until years 6-10. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Bank on corner of Woodford Road and Syddal Road
properties.Site_description: Bank and surface parking in the centre of Bramhall
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The current use as a bank would have to cease before the site can come forward for residential use. Due to the sustainable location, there is potential for higher density than indicated in the estimate of yield.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is accessible, located close to a train station (within 600m) and is in a sustainable location. The loss of the site for employment uses would need to be justified and mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: The site is not considered to be available yet, due to its active use. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Land near 265 Edgeley Road, Edgeley, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Former petrol station, garaging and open storage
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is in a mix of uses. Potential redevelopment of the site offers an opportunity to improve biodiversity and green infrastructure on the site, and improve amenity for nearby dwellings.  The site boundary should be redefined at the next comprehensive update of the SHLAA.

properties.Site_description: Oakwood Mills, bowling green and sub station.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is used as a paper mill. The buildings could be partially redeveloped to create a mixed use scheme providing a number of apartments and higher quality employment premises.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is accessible, located close to a train station (within 600m) and is in a sustainable location. There may be some contamination issues on the site which will need to be remediated or demonstrated to be safe, prior to redevelopment for residential occupation of the land. Around a quarter of the site is within a conservation area. Any loss of employment uses would need to be justified and mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be required to created a single development parcel, so the site is not considered to be available yet. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Woodbank Works Industrial Estate, Turncroft Lane, Stockport
properties.Site_description: Industrial estate in residential area.
properties.Notes: Assumed 100% terraces/mews due to surrounding typology
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The current highway access for this site is narrow and not up to modern standards for industrial premises. Some of the buildings may be suitable for conversion into residential.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. There may be some contamination issues on the site which will need to be remediated or demonstrated to be safe, prior to redevelopment for residential occupation of the land.  The loss of the site for employment uses would need to be justified and mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be required to created a single development parcel, so the site is not considered to be available yet. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Metropolitan House, Station Road, Cheadle Hulme SK8 7AB
properties.Site_description: L-shaped office block in district centre location, adjacent to railway line and surrounded by commercial uses.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This is a 4 and 5 storey office block with on-site parking which could potentially be converted to residential under the prior approval process, or demolished to make way for new development.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is accessible, located close to a train station (within 600m) and is in a sustainable location. The existing office building may be able to be converted into residential use under the prior approval process.
properties.Availability_assessment: The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies. There are no known legal or ownership issues.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable.

properties.Site_name: Vauxhall Industrial Estate, Greg Street, Reddish, SK5 7BR
properties.Site_description: Industrial estate with a mix of types/ages buildings, next to railway line.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This area is an employment allocation would not normally be considered to be suitable for housing, however areas closer to existing residential properties could potentially be released for housing over the longer term, provided that the remainder of the site is utilised to provide improved employment facilities. The yield has been reduced to reflect this.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is accessible, and located close to a train station (within 600m) and is in a sustainable location, but the nearest train station, Reddish South, operates a ghost service. The site is part of a designated employment allocation, and any loss of this would have to be robustly justified and mitigation required. There may be some contamination issues on the site which will need to be remediated or demonstrated to be safe, prior to redevelopment for residential occupation of the land.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be required to created a single development parcel, so the site is not considered to be available yet. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Etchells Road Open space
properties.Site_description: Area of open space bounded by residential development, the A34 and a large retailing unit.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: The site is local open space that could potentially come forward for residential development, subject to suitable mitigation being made. A number of mature trees are located mainly on the periphery of the site, so the developable area should be reduced to accommodate protection of trees.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. The land is identifed as Green Chain, so any redevelopment of the site would have to be undertaken in a way that does not detract from the wildlife or recreation value of the Green Chain. There are a number of mature trees on the site. The site is designated as local open space, which has scored low for quality and value in the Open Space Assessment, any loss of this should be appropriately mitigated.
properties.Availability_assessment: The site is considered to be available within the next 5 years. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_description: Scrubland set next to railway line and builders yard
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is landfill which would not normally be considered suitable for residential development due to the issues it presents. However subject to assessment of ground contamination, there may be a possiblity of this site being safely decontaminated, and redeveloped for over over the longer term, in conjunction with the site to the west SKH17079
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. properties.Availability_assessment: The availability of this site needs to be confirmed, but is likely to be in single ownership. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Notes: The estimated capacity is based on planning application reference DC/066807.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is deliverable.
properties.Assessment_text: After the baseline date of the study, a planning application was submitted on the site for a mix of demolition and conversion of the buildings to provide 149 dwellings, and was awaiting determination.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and is in a sustainable location. The loss of employment uses must be justified and mitigated. There may be some contamination issues which will need to be remediated or demonstrated to be safe for residential uses, prior to any redevelopment.
properties.Availability_assessment: The site is considered to be available within the next 5 years.The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies. There are no known legal or ownership issues.

properties.Site_name: R Bullock & Co, Commercial Garage, Stockport Road, SK8 2AG
properties.Site_description: Coach depot in residential area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This site is in commercial use, is surrounded by residential dwellings, with access is taken from a residential street. Potential redevelopment of the site offers an opportunity to improve biodiversity and green infrastructure on the site, and improve amenity for nearby dwellings.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. Around 40% of the site is covered by flood risk zone 2, so a flood risk assessment will need to be undertaken prior to any development taking place.
properties.Availability_assessment: The availability of this site needs to be confirmed, but is likely to be in single ownership. The necessary infrastructure is considered to be available within the locality, but provision to the site will need to be confirmed with the relevant utility companies.
properties.Achievability_summary: The site is considered to be achievable, at the point in time estimated for development.

properties.Site_name: Demmings Industrial Estate, Brookfield Rd, Cheadle
properties.Site_description: Industrial estate in residential area
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is developable.
properties.Assessment_text: This employment site scored poorly in the ELR, and is considered to be one of the poorest quality employment sites within the borough. A weak bridge for access makes it unsuitable for HGVs. Redevelopment for residential offers an opportunity to improve amenity and biodiversity in the area.
properties.Suitability_assessment: The site is not located close to a train station, but is otherwise accessible and in a sustainable location. The loss of any employment uses would need to be justified and mitigated. There may be some contamination issues on part of the site which will need to be remediated or demonstrated to be safe, prior to redevelopment for residential occupation of the land.
properties.Availability_assessment: Some land purchase and assembly may be require to created a single development parcel, so the site is not considered to be available yet. properties.Site_name: Springmount Mill, Northgate Road, Stockport

properties.Notes: The estimated capacity is based on planning application reference DC/064893.
properties.Assessment_summary: The site is deliverable.
